import sys, os

N, K = map(int, input().split())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] >= K:
        count += 1

print(count)

import sys

N, K = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()))
h = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] >= K:
        count += 1

print(count)



import sys

N, K = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()))
h = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] >= K:
        count += 1

print(count)

n, k = map(int, input().split())
h = [int(input()) for _ in range(n)]
print(sum(1 if i >= k else 0 for i in h))


n, k = map(int, input().split())

h = [int(input()) for _ in range(n)]
print(sum(1 if i >= k else 0 for i in h))
